SVPD_BARCODE_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS SVPD_BASE_GB , T2.PD_PRP_VAL16 AS SVPD_BASE_COLOR_GB , T2.PD_PRP_VAL24 AS SVPD_REFUR_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL25 AS SVPD_QTYLMT_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL26 AS SVPD_DISPOSAL_COST
